### Senior Data Scientist, Levelling Up Squad

Office for National Statistics Data Science Campus

Newport, Wales

Jan 2022 to present

- Undertaking research & analysis in the domain of socio-economic inequality across the UK.
- Senior dev on [multimodal transport modelling](https://datasciencecampus.ons.gov.uk/using-open-data-to-understand-hyperlocal-differences-in-uk-public-transport-availability/) project with Open Trip Planner Java library, python GIS stack, Open Street Map & open source public transport schedule data. Innovative geometries published to [ONS Geoportal](https://geoportal.statistics.gov.uk/search?q=isochrones) as ESRI shapefiles.
